gurmukhi: jy jy gaus AMbIAw Bey ] mY mY krq jgq qy gey ]
transliteration: Je Je Gaddd Anbooaa Bhae|| Mai Mai Karat Jagad Te Gade||
translation: All the earlier prophets ended themselves in ego.

gurmukhi: mhwprK kwhU n pCwnw ] krm Drm ko kCU n jwnw ]45]
transliteration: Mahaapurakh Kaahoo Na Pachhaadaa|| Karam Dharam Ko; Kachhodh Na Jaanaa||45||
translation: And did not comprehend the supreme Purusha, they did not care for the righteous actions.45.

gurmukhi: Avrn kI Awsw ikCu nwhI ] eykY Aws Dro mn mwhI ]
transliteration: Avran Koo Aasaa Kichh(u) Naahoo|| Ekai Aas Ddaro Man Maahoo||
translation: Have no hopes on others, rely only on the ONE Lord.

gurmukhi: Awn Aws aupjq ikCu nwhI ] vw kI Aws DroN mn mwhI ]46]
transliteration: Aan Aas Oupjat Kichh(u) Naahoo|| Waa Koo Aas Ddaron Man Maahoo||46||
translation: The hopes on others are never fruitful, therefore, keep in your mind the hopes on the ONE Lord.46.

gurmukhi: koeI pVHq kurwn ko koeI pVHq purwn ]
transliteration: Ko( i)  Padhat Kuraan Ko Ko( i)  Padhat Puraan||
translation: Someone studies the Quran and someone studies the Puranas.

gurmukhi: kwl n skq bcwie kY Pokt Drm indwn ]47]
transliteration: Kaal Na Sakat Bachaae Kai Phokat Dharam Nidaan||47||
translation: Mere reading cannot save one from death. Therefore such works are vain and do not help at the time of death.47.

gurmukhi: keI koit imil pVHq kurwnw ] bwcq ikqy purwn Ajwnw ]
transliteration: Kaoo Kottee Mil(i) Padhat Kuraanaa|| Baachat Kite Puraanndajaanaa||
translation: Millions of people recite the Quran and many study Puranas witout understanding the crux.

gurmukhi: AMq kwl koeI kwm n Awvw ] dwv kwl kwhU n bcwvw ]48]
transliteration: Ant Kaal Ko( i)  Kaam Na Aavaa|| Daav Kaal Kaahoo Na Badhaavaa||48||
translation: It will be of no use at the time of death and none will be saved.48.

gurmukhi: ikau n jpo qw ko qum BweI ] AMq kwl jo hoie shweI ]
transliteration: Kio Na Japo Taa Ko Toum Bhaaoo|| Ant Kaal Jo Hoe Sahaaoo||
translation: O Brother! Why do you not meditate on Him, who will help you at the time of death?

gurmukhi: Pokt Drm lKo kr Brmw ] ien qy srq n koeI krmw ]49]
transliteration: Phokat Dharam Lakho Kar Bharmaa|| In Te Sarat Na Ko( i)  Karmaa||49||
translation: Consider the vain religions as illusory, because they do not serve our purpose (of life).49.

gurmukhi: ieh kwrn pRBu hmY bnwXo ] Bydu BwiK iehu lok pTwXo ]
transliteration: Eh Kaaran Prabh(u) Hamai Banaayo|| Bhed(u) Bhaakh(i) Eh(u) Lok Pathaayo||
translation: For this reason the Lord created me and sent me in this world, telling me the secret.

gurmukhi: jo iqn khw su sBn aucroN ] ifMB ivMB kCu nYk k kroN ]50]
transliteration: Jo Tin Kahaa Su Sabhan Oucdaron|| Dinbh Vinbh Kachh(u) Naik Na Daron||50||
translation: Whatever He told me, I say unto you, there is not even a little heresay in it.50.
